response.overview: As World War II rages, the elite Sixth Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.
response.tagline: The most daring rescue mission of our time is a story that has never been told
response.title: The Great Raid
